Package project1

Class ShoppingBag

java.lang.Object
project1.ShoppingBag
public class ShoppingBag
extends java.lang.Object
Container class that performs shopping bag operations on an object array that holds grocery items
Author:
TANKPINOU PADONOU, FERRIS HUSSEIN

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ShoppingBag()
    This method creates a new bag with a limit of 5 items

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(project1.GroceryItem item)
    This method first checks if the bag is full, if so, we invoke the grow() method to extend the bag to hold 5 more items.
    void CheckOut()
    This method check out all the items in the bag array including sales total, sales tax and the total amount paid
    int getCapacity()
    Helper method, to return the number of items in shopping bag
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    testbed main Implements test cases specified in test document on each method
    void print()
    This method prints all the grocery items in the bag array
    boolean remove​(project1.GroceryItem item)
    This methods invokes the find() method to locate the index of the grocery item to be removes and removes the item from the bag array and decreases the bag size by 1.
    double salesPrice()
    This method calculates and returns the total price of all the items in the bag array
    double salesTax()
    This method calculates and returns the total price of taxable items in the bag array and invokes 6.625% tax on each taxable item

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingBag

      public ShoppingBag()
      This method creates a new bag with a limit of 5 items

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add​(project1.GroceryItem item)
      This method first checks if the bag is full, if so, we invoke the grow() method to extend the bag to hold 5 more items. Then, we add the item to the bag array and increment the size by 1.
      Parameters:
      item - , the grocery item that will be added to the bag

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(project1.GroceryItem item)
      This methods invokes the find() method to locate the index of the grocery item to be removes and removes the item from the bag array and decreases the bag size by 1.
      Parameters:
      item - , grocery item to be removed from bag array
      Returns:
      isRemoved, true if item is successfully removed, false otherwise

    • salesPrice

      public double salesPrice()
      This method calculates and returns the total price of all the items in the bag array
      Returns:
      total, double value of total price of items in bag array

    • salesTax

      public double salesTax()
      This method calculates and returns the total price of taxable items in the bag array and invokes 6.625% tax on each taxable item
      Returns:
      total, double value of total price of taxable items in bag array with 6.625% tax applied

    • print

      public void print()
      This method prints all the grocery items in the bag array

    • getCapacity

      public int getCapacity()
      Helper method, to return the number of items in shopping bag
      Returns:
      size, number of items in bag array

    • CheckOut

      public void CheckOut()
      This method check out all the items in the bag array including sales total, sales tax and the total amount paid

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      testbed main Implements test cases specified in test document on each method
      Parameters:
      args - , arguments
